resources.string: Listen to the recording and answer the multiple-choice question by selecting the correct response. Only one response is correct.
Listen to the recording and answer the question by selecting all the correct responses. More than one response is correct.
You will hear a recording. Type the missing words in each blank.

Type in words and click on \'Guess\' or press ENTER. (Score +1 per correct word). Click on any gap to see the word. (Score -1 per word). You may want to see the summary before you start. (Score -10 to see the text)

There are 8 questions in this quiz. You will hear a sentence. Type the sentence in the box below exactly as you hear it. Write as much of the sentence as you can. You should listen to the sentence only once.
